itemLabel: Joyce Anelay, Baroness Anelay of St Johns

wikipedia_page.main: Joyce Anne Anelay, Baroness Anelay of St Johns,  (born 17 July 1947), is a British Conservative Party politician, previously serving as Minister of State of the Foreign and Commonwealth Office from August 2014 to June 2017. Lady Anelay was appointed as Minister of State at the Department for Exiting the European Union in the Second May ministry, after the 2017 reshuffle.Lady Anelay was Government Chief Whip in the House of Lords from 12 May 2010 until 6 August 2014, having previously been Opposition Chief Whip prior to the 2010 General Election.

response: #REDIRECT Joyce Anelay, Baroness Anelay of St Johns
